org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec

Class LimitOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator<LimitDesc>
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.LimitOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Node
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VectorLimitOperator

    public class LimitOperator
extends Operator<LimitDesc>
implements Serializable
    Limit operator implementation Limits the number of rows to be passed on.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
